mapper.select: SELECT T1.OG_ID AS CODE_ID , MAX(T1.OG_NM || ' (' || T1.OG_CD || ')') AS CODE_NAME FROM TB_OGBS_MM_OG_IZ T1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND T1.BASE_YM >= SUBSTR(#{startDt},0,6) AND T1.BASE_YM <= SUBSTR(#{endDt},0,6) AND T1.OG_TP_CD IN ('W03', 'W06') AND T1.CLO_DT IS NULL AND T1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' GROUP BY T1.OG_ID ORDER BY T1.OG_ID
